author: dezzio
msg: OpenJPA-1051: Fixed MappingDefaultsImpl to avoid column name duplications when long column names are supplied for a database that accepts only shorter names. Changes submitted for Ravi Palacherla and Hiroki Tateno.

author: jgallimore
msg: Use 3.1 instead of 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT so you don't require a snapshot build of openejb in your local repo
